summary: Completed frontend testing for iteration 7: Static pages, footer links, privacy popup, Turkish characters, admin portfolio TL equivalents - All features working correctly
critical_code_review_comments: All static pages load correctly with proper Turkish characters
Footer has all required links (Hakkımızda, Ekibimiz, Kariyer, Basında Biz, Kullanım Şartları, KVKK)
Privacy popup (Gizlilik Politikası) opens from footer button
Admin portfolio management shows TL equivalents in both add and delete dialogs
Alarko logo displays correctly in navbar across all pages
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 7 tested the following new features: 1) Static pages at /hakkimizda, /ekibimiz, /kariyer, /basinda, /risk-bilgilendirme, /kullanim-sartlari, /kvkk - all load with correct content, 2) Footer links to static pages all working, 3) Privacy popup (Gizlilik Politikası) opens correctly from footer, 4) Turkish characters (ı, İ, ş, Ş, ç, Ç, ğ, ö, ü) display correctly across landing page and static pages, 5) Admin portfolio management TL equivalents display correctly in add share dialog (shows 'TL Karşılığı' with share price calculation) and delete share dialog (shows 'Silinecek TL Karşılığı'), 6) Alarko Enerji logo displays in navbar

features_tested.footer_links_kurumsal: PASSED - Hakkımızda, Ekibimiz, Kariyer, Basında Biz links present

features_tested.footer_privacy_popup: PASSED - Gizlilik Politikası button opens dialog with full policy text

features_tested.static_page_ekibimiz: PASSED - /ekibimiz loads with correct title and content
features_tested.static_page_kariyer: PASSED - /kariyer loads with correct title and content

features_tested.turkish_chars_static_pages: PASSED - Found 9/12 Turkish special chars on static pages
features_tested.admin_portfolios_page: PASSED - /admin/portfolios loads with investor list (96 investors)
